title: Soplang: The Somalia Programming Language
description: Developing Somalia's first native programming language with features tailored for Somali developers and localized syntax.

title: AI-Powered Code Assistant
description: Building an intelligent coding assistant that understands Somali language instructions and generates code in multiple programming languages.

title: Somali Tech Education Platform
description: Creating an accessible learning platform for tech education specifically designed for Somali speakers with localized content.
